message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product that I think you'd really enjoy. I'm asking for $115 for it. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making an offer of $105. Can you consider it?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to come down to $110 for the product.  What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $110. How about $108? Can you meet me there?
